sentences.en: 41 A smooth sea never made a skillful mariner.
sentences.cn: 41平静的大海练不出好水手.

sentences.en: A hypocrite's movements should have been more skillful.
sentences.cn: 伪君子的举止一定巧妙得多.

sentences.en: a skillful footballer
sentences.cn: 技巧娴熟的足球运动员

sentences.en: A smooth sea never made a skillful mariner.
sentences.cn: 平静的大海决不能造就熟练的水手.

sentences.en: His skillful one - upmanship won him the election.
sentences.cn: 他那胜人一筹的伎俩为他赢得选举.

sentences.en: Historians say Leonardo was one of the most skillful lyre players in all of Italy.
sentences.cn: 历史学家说，莱昂纳多在意大利的最熟练的七弦琴球员之一。

sentences.en: I like making things by hand because my mother is very skillful, and I liked staying with her when I was young.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢亲手作一些东西，这是因为我母亲的手非常巧，而且我小的时候喜欢同她在一起。

sentences.en: It was very skillful of you to repair my bicycle.
sentences.cn: 你修好了我的自行车,技术真好.

sentences.en: Lincoln himself was highly skillful in the use of " tongue - in - cheek " humor.
sentences.cn: 林肯本人运用 “ 戏谑 式 ” 幽默也得心应手.

sentences.en: Military tactics are skillful.
sentences.cn: 兵法巧妙.

sentences.en: One's art of fraud is skillful [ superb ].
sentences.cn: 骗术 高明.

sentences.en: Soon they became very skillful in answering such questions.
sentences.cn: 很快他们就会很熟练地回答这种问题了.

sentences.en: Speed requires training, confidence, morale, suitable transport, and skillful leadership.
sentences.cn: 要想达到迅速的目的,则有赖于训练 、 信心 、 士气 、 以及良好的运输, 精明的领导等等.

sentences.en: That is a skillful operation.
sentences.cn: 那是一次技术高超的手术.

sentences.en: That's a skillful piece of bricklaying.
sentences.cn: 那是件精巧的砌砖工作.

sentences.en: The child has become skillful in reading and writing.
sentences.cn: 那个小孩变得善于读写.

sentences.en: The promoter matched the young boxer with a more skillful fighter.
sentences.cn: 拳击竞赛主办者让这位年轻拳击手和技术更娴熟的拳师较量.

sentences.en: The promoters matched the young boxer with a more skillful fighter.
sentences.cn: 发起人安排这位年轻的拳击选手同一位更老练的拳击手比赛.

sentences.en: They understand that development is a difficult social activity that can be conquered not by a silver bullet, but rather by dedicated, skillful practitioners who know and leverage proven techniques.
sentences.cn: 开发是一项有难度的社会活动，不仅不能够通过银弹来征服，而是由理解并实施可靠技术的那些专注且熟练的人们来解决。

sentences.en: With a skillful movement he rounded the small fishing-boat.
sentences.cn: 他以灵巧的动作使小渔船调过头来。

sentences.en: With skillful manipulation of illumination and the solid-void relationship, the overall effect achieved is a harmonious integration between architecture and nature.
sentences.cn: 该建筑有着光线的巧妙处理和结实体块的关系，整个效果实现是建筑和自然间的和谐综合。

sentences.en: Yes. It was a skillful archer who saved the earth.
sentences.cn: 是的。 是一个熟练的弓箭手拯救了地球。

words.tran_cn: （英）熟练的；灵巧的；技术好的（等于skillful）
熟练的；有技能的；需要技能的

trans.tran_en: (<英>skilful)good at doing something, especially something that needs special ability or training
